sn45.90:4.2: A mendicant accomplished in rational attention can expect to
sn45.90:4.3: develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path.
sn45.90:4.4: And how does a mendicant accomplished in rational attention develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path?
sn45.90:4.5: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness,
sn45.90:4.6: and right samādhi culminating in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion.
sn45.90:4.7: That’s how a mendicant accomplished in rational attention develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.”
